item.title: How we sometimes want to do too much, and what we can do about it
item.description: We often hear the criticisms of others telling us that we do not do enough of what we are supposed to. Seldom, however, do the words, “you have to do less” fall upon our ears. In a society where more is merrier, and bigger is better, we strive to accumulate all that we can as fast as we can. This …
